#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

int main() {
   int count, number;
   cin >> count;
   for (int i = 0; i < count; ++i) {
      cin >> number;
      int sum = 1;
      for ( int j = 2; j * j <= number; ++j ) {
         if ( number % j == 0 ) {
            sum += j;
            sum += number / j;
         }
         if ( j * j == number ) sum -= j; // recalculate twice
      }
      cout << sum << endl;
   }
}
